text: Manitas de Plata (born Ricardo Baliardo; 7 August 1921 â€“ 5 November 2014) was a French Gitano flamenco guitarist. He had toured the whole world since 1967, and recorded discs. He played with the dancer Nina Corti. In 1968 he played at the Royal Variety Performance in London. ==Other websites== Category:1921 births Category:2014 deaths Category:French musicians
title: Manitas de Plata
